pages.text: In order to get started with candle making, the first thing you will need to get is some Soybeans. These can be grown from Soybean Seeds which are dropped by Witches.

pages.title: Making the Press
pages.text: Next you will need to craft yourself an $(d)Empty Iron Press$(). This will be used to crush the soybeans into a paste.

pages.title: Filling the Press
pages.text: Fill the press with your soybeans. This will yield a $(d)Full Iron Press$().

pages.title: Making Some Raw Wax
pages.text: Now we can press our soybeans and get  16 Chunks of $(d)Raw Soy Wax$().

pages.title: Cooking by the Book
pages.text: Now simply place your Chunks of Raw Wax into any furnace and heat. This will provide you with some nice Chunks of $(d)Soy Wax$().

pages.title: A Chunk of a Chunk
pages.text: Finally, Regular soy wax can be used in its regular form, or it can be crafted into smaller chunks in a crafting table. Different recipes require different amounts of wax, so remember this recipe.
